author: djrtwo
content:
My comments are mainly that you *cannot* have multiple shards with independent states/execution unless you solve state growth (likely via consensus level statelessness)

As piper notes, that is just a core consensus level statement. There is much more work for such statelessness to be useful to end users in a decentralized way
